normalized: while towako was moaning from her first orgasm at the molesters'hands-
-an oblivious reika was looking after 'shinmachi paperback' in hermaster's absence.
at the moment she is all alone in the library.
today was a calm day, without a single visitor.
then again, they don'tget that many customers in the first place.
reika glances over at the clock.
it's about time to close shop.

name: reika
normalized: *sigh*
she listlessly gets up from her librarian's desk, moving a bitsluggishly.
unsteady, even.
it's a good thing that towako isn't around to see what a mess she is.

name: reika
normalized: i'm a failure as a butler if i can't even take care of my ownhealth…
reika feels tired and hot like when having a fever.
her condition hadnot improved as of late.
in fact, she feels worse and worse every day.
naturally she went to see a doctor in secret from towako.
regular ones, famous ones, she tried them all.
but their diagnose is always the same: no abnormalities.
her body is healthy and she had not sustained any psychological traumaeither.
and yet reika feels sick.

name: reika
normalized: i wonder if milady is alright?
i feel uneasy somehow…
she thinks of towako, who is yet to return home.
ever since koso mentioned that a slave dealer might be connected toyuyami, her mistress was acting recklessly.
well, it may be in towako's nature to act reckless, but reika stillcannot help but worry.
the butler sees something dark flash before her eyes.
in the nextmoment the front door opens and someone enters the library.

name: mikio
normalized: good evening.
it's mikio, a boy they know.
reika quickly shifts gears from an assassin's mindset into a 'big sister'-mode.

name: reika
normalized: what are you doing outside at such a late hour？

name: mikio
normalized: how are you feeling, big sis?

name: mikio
normalized: i thought you would run out of medicine before you got better, so ibrought more from my grandma.

name: mikio
normalized: i hope it wasn't neccessary?
are you feeling better, big sis?
it looks like the kid was only worried about her, so reika pats hishead and smiles gently.

name: reika
normalized: thank you, mikio.
i feel much better thanks to your grandmother'smedicine.
she lied.
while she did drink the medicine, it doesn't seem to have worked.
but she doesn't want to disappoint this caring boy.

name: mikio
normalized: ah, i see!
that's good to hear.
he sounds genuinely happy.

name: mikio
normalized: but you know, big sis?
it's not good to lie!

name: reika
normalized: huh?
mikio laughs at the surprised butler.

name: mikio
normalized: something like that can't be cured by traditional chinese medicine.
big sis reika suffers from an incubus curse, you know?

name: reika
normalized: mikio…?

name: mikio
normalized: you still didn't notice?
for some time now you've been seeing anincubus, only to forget about it as soon as you wake up.

name: reika
normalized: y…you…?!
reika is shocked!
something does not feel right!
an incubus?!
why is he smiling?
and was this child's smile always so wicked?
why didn't she notice it until now?!

name: mikio
normalized: so, did you finally realize it?

name: mikio
normalized: me and big sis were doing sexy things in your dreams every night fora while now.

name: mikio
normalized: we can subconsciously turn a person into our servant through thedreams.

name: mikio
normalized: and lately, i've taken a liking to big sis reika.

name: reika
normalized: *gasp*!
magic energy begins to overflow from mikio's body.
the face of a young boy changes.
his eyes turn red with an evil gleam in them.
the flesh on the sidesof his forehead bulges and curves.
he no longer looks human.
this is his real form.

name: reika
normalized: y-you are…?!

name: shutendoji
normalized: my name is shutendoji.
i'm from an incubus clan that had been aroundfor thousands of years.
mikio- no, shutendoji introduces himself.

name: reika
normalized: h-how…?!

name: shutendoji
normalized: why, sister reika!
you look surprised.

name: shutendoji
normalized: hehe, i see.
are you confused, sis?
about when did i become mikio?
and how could a diviner not notice a demon under her nose?
that's it,right?
shutendoji speaks in mikoto's voice, but with bottomless malice in it.

name: reika
normalized: you'll tell me after i slice you into tiny bits.
reika is holding a pair of swords in her hands that miraculouslyappeared out of nowhere.
this is a treasured heirloom of the shiki family, rumoured to be ableto subdue spirits.

name: shutendoji
normalized: just like in the rumours!
they look so cool-
the swords flash before the demon can finish his sentence.
*cut!
both of shutendoji's severed arms fall to the floor.

name: shutendoji
normalized: waai, you can even cut me with it!

name: reika
normalized: well then, let's hear i- what the?!
reika blinks in disbelief: both arms that were supposed to be cut offre-attach themselves to the demon's body with surprising swiftness.

name: shutendoji
normalized: i met both you and towako as mikio for the first time.
i've hadplenty of time to set up a curse.
so you see, sister rei-
*chop!
reika ignores his speech and goes for the neck.

name: reika
normalized: ha!
as the severed head is falling to the ground, the butler takes it onestep further and slices it in the air into tiny pieces.

name: shutendoji
normalized: waah, how mean~♪

name: reika
normalized: tsk, still not enough?
reika clicks her tongue.
shutendoji grows a new head as he teases her.

name: shutendoji
normalized: why, big sis, have you never encountered an incubus before?
you can't kill me no matter how much you cut.
hey, are you listening?
of course she isn't.
if slicing won't kill it, something else might.
reika quickly takes out a paper doll used by the diviners for spiritsummoning.

name: reika
normalized: "weapon arm"!
the souls and grudges of wayward swordsmen are sealed in her weapons.
granted life by the summoning spell, they manifest themselves as two additional magical hands on the butler's back.
…or at least they should.

name: reika
normalized: huh?!
now she is genuinely surprised!
reika's summoning doesn't work.
this never happened to her before!

name: shutendoji
normalized: huh, what's wrong?
didn't you want to summon your spirit patron?

name: shutendoji
normalized: it's pointless, you know.
no matter how much you call, if the otherparty cannot hear you, it's all pointless, big sis!
shutendoji mocks the girl with a wide grin.
she cannot feel the presence of her bound patron spirit nearby.

name: reika
normalized: could this be…?!

name: shutendoji
normalized: so, did you finally notice?
we're in your dream, sister.

name: shutendoji
normalized: i live in dreams!
no other spirit, let alone a patron spirit can bein a dream.
we, incubi, rule the dreams as we rule the women!
in the next moment-
the space around them distorts.
there is only a complete and utter darkness.
reika cannot see anything.
the world is constantly shifting.
where is she?
she cannot even tell if she's standing or movingsomewhere.

name: reika
normalized: geh!
who is it?!
are you working with someone else?
the butler shouts instinctively.
she doesn't have solid proof, but shedoubts an incubus could come up with such an elaborate plan.

name: shutendoji
normalized: ahaha, you've got good intuition, big sister!
she hears a laugh from somewhere.

name: reika
normalized: to be able to conceal your demonic presence while you work on thecurse…could it be…?!

name: shutendoji
normalized: yep.
nobody else can cloud your and towako's eyes to such extent.

name: reika
normalized: this cannot be?!
…if i don't inform milady this instant-!

name: shutendoji
normalized: hey, going somewhere?

name: reika
normalized: shut up!
reika slashes her swords in the direction where the voice came from,but the attack doesn't connect.

name: shutendoji
normalized: ahahahahahaa!
the demon's laughter echoes from all directions.

name: shutendoji
normalized: my mission is to take big sis reika out of the picture and isolateyou from towako.
but don't worry, i won't kill you straight away.

name: shutendoji
normalized: i'll give you plenty of training.
you see, it is a hobby of mine toreduce tough diviners like yourself to squealing, moaning sows.

name: reika
normalized: don't even joke!

name: shutendoji
normalized: but i am serious, piglet.
a male voice whispers in her ear.
not that of a kid, but of an adult.

name: reika
normalized: geh!
shivers run up reika's spine.
in the next moment, the darkness around her soaks into her body.
and before she knew it, she was back in the real world.

name: shutendoji
normalized: welcome back, big sis reika.
how did you like the dream world?
the demon laughs.
he looks like mikio, like it all really was a dream.
except it wasn't.
this kid is an enemy.

name: reika
normalized: why you-!
the butler attempts to summon her spirit patron right away, but…

name: reika
normalized: wh-what the…?!
her body doesn't move, like it's tied up with a rope.
as soon as she tried to recite the spell, her mouth cramped up.

name: shutendoji
normalized: ahaha!
didn't i tell you?
the incubi rule the dreams and rule thewomen!

name: shutendoji
normalized: thus, i control your body, sister reika.

name: shutendoji
normalized: reality doesn't exist for you anymore.
we're in my world now.
nifty, isn't it?

name: reika
normalized: wha-?!
against her will, reika's arms move on their own accord.
she pointsher blades at her own neck.

name: reika
normalized: gh?!
the blades that slaughtered many spirits now shine dully in the napeof her neck and there's nothing she can do about them.

name: shutendoji
normalized: do you want to die, sister reika?
